long_description: The waterproof Magellan Triton 1500 GPS offers powerful mapping options such as National Geographic TOPO!(R), high-tech tools and legendary navigational performance to guide your outdoor adventure. Bright, sunlight-readable and scratch-resistant touchscreen features intuitive, menu-driven usability and is easy to view in almost any light. SiRFstarIII(TM) chipset helps ensure a rapid satellite fix and reliable position lock in narrow valleys, dense woods and urban jungles. Wide Area Augmentation System (WAAS) and integrated multidirectional antennae offer GPS accuracy to 3 meters. 400MHz processor handles dynamic routing and multitasking with ease; finger-friendly touchscreen interface makes navigation easy. Built-in basemap includes the 48 contiguous United States, Alaska, and Canada (major highways, city centers, bodies of water and more) plus worldwide geographic boundaries. Import detailed maps from National Geographic TOPO and Weekend Explorer 3D, as well as Magellan MapSend. Digital compass determines accurate direction of travel; barometric altimeter with pressure tracking analyzes pressure differences to determine accurate elevation. The Magellan Triton 1500 GPS features a stylus for precise touchscreen mapping, a digital picture organizer, MP3 player and integrated speaker. Internal microphone lets you record geo-coded voice annotations to routes; audio jack allows private listening with headphones (not included). Waterproof construction keeps unit functioning under 1m of water for up to 30 min; rugged rubberized housing is easy to grip. Expandable memory via SD cards (not included) for maps, audio and pictures; included USB cable connects to your computer for uploading and downloading. Works with alkaline, lithium or NiCad rechargeable batteries (batteries not included); alkaline batteries provide up to 10 hours of normal use with GPS continuously on.
